sentence.Network_en: The scientists will study the variety of trees and observe which are fruiting.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家将研究各种树木，并观察哪些会结果实。

sentence.Network_en: The main stem and fruiting branches of determinant types remain relatively short.
sentence.Network_cn: 有限生长类型的主茎和果枝仍然较短.

sentence.Network_en: Nitrogen supply largely controls the growth and fruiting of most plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 氮的供应密切地关系到绝大多数植物的生长与结果.

entry.def: Fruit or a fruit is something which grows on a tree or bush and which contains seeds or a stone covered by a substance that you can eat.

example.ex: Fresh fruit and vegetables provide fibre and vitamins.
example.tran: 新鲜水果和蔬菜提供植物纤维素和维生素。

entry.def: If a plant fruits, it produces fruit.

example.ex: The scientists will study the variety of trees and observe which are fruiting.
example.tran: 科学家将研究各种树木，并观察哪些会结果实。

entry.def: The fruits or the fruit of someone's work or activity are the good things that result from it.

example.ex: The team have really worked hard and Mansell is enjoying the fruits of that labour...
example.tran: 这支队伍真正付出了辛劳，而曼塞尔正在享受着这种辛劳的成果。

example.ex: The findings are the fruit of more than three years research.
example.tran: 这些发现是3年多研究的成果。

entry.tran: 取得成果;奏效;产生好的结果
entry.def: If the effort that you put into something or a particular way of doing something bears fruit, it is successful and produces good results.

example.ex: Eleanor's work among the women will, I trust, bear fruit...
example.tran: 我相信埃莉诺在妇女中所做的工作会见成效的。

example.ex: He was naturally disappointed when the talks failed to bear fruit.
example.tran: 会谈没有取得成果，他自然感到失望。

entry.tran: (项目或活动的)初步成果，最初成效
entry.def: The first fruits or the first fruit of a project or activity are its earliest results or profits.

example.ex: This project is one of the first fruits of commercial co-operation between the two countries.
example.tran: 这个项目是两国商业合作的初步成果之一。

auth_sentence.content: They may become noticeable when fruiting, either as mushrooms or molds.
auth_sentence.res_content: They may become noticeable when fruiting, either as mushrooms or molds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They may become noticeable when fruiting, either as mushrooms or molds.

auth_sentence.content: In the few places where it has been seen, it doesn't produce its toadstool-shaped fruiting bodies every year.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the few places where it has been seen, it doesn't produce its toadstool-shaped fruiting bodies every year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the few places where it has been seen, it doesn't produce its toadstool-shaped fruiting bodies every year.

auth_sentence.content: Peg these stems down to the soil to encourage the small plants to root and produce new fruiting plants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Peg these stems down to the soil to encourage the small plants to root and produce new fruiting plants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Peg these stems down to the soil to encourage the small plants to root and produce new fruiting plants.
